channel.title: Crunch speaks research on Data, Smarter.
channel.description: Recent content in Crunch speaks research on Data, Smarter.

item.title: Crunch is extensible
item.description: Everything that you can do in the app and much more can be accomplished through our robust API. This makes it easy to incorporate Crunch into your data workflows.

item.title: Unlimited possibilities
item.description: Our datasets work seamlessly with your scientific computing infrastructure. We maintain several R and Python libraries which give users the ability to automate their work on Crunch and use Crunch data in offline analyses.
